data.title: Introductory Chapter: Service Design for Emerging Technologies Product Development
data.sourcetitle: Springer Series in Design and Innovation
data.abstract: This book was born from the idea of taking a comprehensive look at the current state of service design for product development in relation to emerging technologies. Such work requires holistic, multidisciplinary collaboration, particularly between service designers, marketers, businesspeople, managers, and engineers. New technologies trigger innovation and they have and will continue to shape our daily lives.
